https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fIr0zZbPtJyInJr7lu0isd8yu0O.jpg Hotel manager Willow returns to her stunning Virginia hometown to help her sister plan a Christmas wedding at the inn her family once owned. She must work with current owner and single dad David, who wants to let go of the past. A Blue Ridge Mountain Christmas
